column2: Single OATT for all services and all customers
Real time energy balancing market with  hourly market clearing prices (and no penalties for imbalance)
Zonal markets for real time energy balancing market defined by electrically significant constraints
Mandatory generation participation in real time energy market
Day Ahead market:  ISO load forecast creates demand curve, generation offers create supply curve (hourly)
Market based congestion management independently administered by market function
Load pays Transmission fixed costs through access fee
Potential to self-supply ancillary services (with ISO as POLR)
Public Release of market and operating information (outages, supply curve,demand curves, interchange, etc.).
No preferential allocation of congestion rights.
All responses use best available information of status as of date listed above and may change over time.
